text:
The namespace nisl.signals was renamed in nisl.signal (the "s" was dropped), just to be consistent with the namespace scipy.signal. The fundamental reason is that nobody should keep asking herself if the namespace should have an "s" or not. 

This is a large modification, that will break many scripts. This pull request is mainly a warning :-)
title: BEWARE: Rename nisl.signals into nisl.signal

text:
Refactoring: renamed nisl.signals in nisl.signal

Dropped the "s" at the end of the module name, to be consistent
with scipy.signal.
